title: Logistics management platform for an orchard
description: Web application for the logistics management of an orchard with three distinct roles. Allows for the creation of reports, sales tracking, and statistical analysis by date or season.

content: Creation of reports to track production stages and sales.
Sales statistics by date, weekly summaries, and visualization of returned products.
Printing of total reports and creation of seasonal report templates.
Weather forecast module up to 15 days to anticipate quantities.
Management of more than 100 different products.
Used by around 40 employees.

title: Mobile app for sharing trips
description: Mobile app for organizing and sharing trips, with over 10k downloads. Completely redesigned in Ionic/React for compatibility with the Apple Store.

content: Easy step-by-step trip creation, with journals that can be shared via email or social media.
Ability to like and comment on steps, as well as create collaborative journals.
Automatic mosaic display of photos, with customizable captions.
Offline functionality thanks to local storage with SQLite.
Notification system for likes and comments.
Over 10,000 downloads.

title: Remote laboratory platform
description: Web platform for remote access to experimental tools, in collaboration with UPJV. Real-time communication via MQTT and WebSockets.

content: Provision of a wide range of experimental devices and tools.
Real-time communication via MQTT and WebSockets to display messages returned by the broker.
Facilitation of teaching, research, and prototyping.
More than 10 tools available.
Twenty activities and thirty tasks managed.

title: Professional simulation platform
description: Web-based professional simulation platform for professionals and public organizations. Use of WebGL/Unity for interactive content.

content: Use of simulations to familiarize users with different professional tasks.
Complex CRUD system with Unity project upload.
Access restricted to professionals and public organizations.
Five different roles available in the simulations.
